content.rendered:
Human resource management has become a vital role for businesses in every industry. Through our SHRM aligned curriculum founded on practical management concepts, you’ll gain the advanced knowledge necessary to support and manage an organization’s human resources department and prepare to take your certification exam.

The following human resources courses, certifications, and credentials are offered by La Verne Extended Learning:

APA FPC/CPP Payroll Certification

Now is the time to Advance Your Payroll Career with an FPC or CPP Certification! Join the 16,000+ payroll professionals who have earned the prestigious Fundamental Payroll Certification (FPC) and Certified Payroll Professional (CPP) designations.

SHRM California Law HR Specialty Credential

La Verne’s SHRM California Law HR Specialty Credential program is ideal for anyone who deals with employees in California, by providing directions for navigating the complexities of California Employment Law.

SHRM CP/SCP – Human Resource Management

The University of La Verne, in association with the Society for Human Resource Management, offers a 39-hour virtual instructor led program designed for HR professionals and specialists looking to keep current and/or develop their careers in the area of human resources.

SHRM Workplace Investigations Specialty Credential

The University of La Verne is recognized by SHRM to offer the SHRM Workplace Investigations Specialty Credential program. This program is ideal for professionals who need and want to conduct effective workplace investigations to reduce their organization’s risk. It provides the skills and knowledge needed to lead investigations that ensure compliance and resolution.
